name: TM Player Mat
description:
Tired of moving all your gold and silver back and forth from the bank to your mat? Your Terraforming Mars games will move faster with this simple app to keep track of all your Martian wealth and you can use all that extra time to focus on crushing your competition. This digital player mat replaces the paper mat and automates much of the in-game accounting:

-Set up your starting resources automatically based on your corporation and the number of cards you purchase from your starting hand.
-Shortcut for using your corporation's actions and effects (when applicable).
-Automatically calculates your regeneration when you advance to the next generation.
-Makes spending steel and titanium on cards easy.
-Shortcuts for buying Standard Projects, raising the temperature with heat, and buying greeneries with plants.
-Scoring tool to simplify end game scoring.

Guaranteed to speed up your Terraforming Mars games by at least 2.5%!
